definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (breathe, snort) be angry (MI id., cf. Ar. 0’anifa As. etc. in deriv.)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[אָנַפְתָּ]] Ps 60:3, etc.; ImPf. [[יֶאֱנַף]] Ps 2:12, etc.;—be angry, of ´[[י]]; usually sq. [[בְּ]] 1Ki 8:46 = 2Ch 6:36, Is 12:1, Ps 85:6, Ezr 9:14; abs. Ps 60:3, Ps 79:5; cf. also Ps 2:12.
